Attilla/Luzbel::

The dragons avoided Razorcraws attack. Attilla attemped bite at 
Razorcraws while Luzbel tried to bite Razorcraw's tail


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Attillas battle cry went both ways as the raptor sprung forward 
raising his
> feet and slashing his sharp toelike claws at the Dragons. Teeth 
snapped,
> claws slashed, tails flew wildly as the growling and roars filled 
the halls
> (Almost reminds me of my divorce.) The raptor had sized up the 
dragons and
> knew that to win he'd have to fight up close so that weapons other 
than body
> parts would be ineffective. He'd anticipated that the two opponents 
would
> lead with thier teeth he just underestimated thier speed. he tried 
to roll
> to the side and slash Attilla as he went passed. As the mutant spun 
aone of
> the dragons razor sharp teeth scraped his neck cutting Razor Claw 
and giving
> the dragon the first taste of blood (Mech fluid.)
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <airly2000@y...>
> To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> Sent: Friday, November 02, 2001 8:57 PM
> Subject: Re: showdown at the OK hallway.
> 
> 
> > Attilla/Luzbel:::
> >
> > "ATTACK!!!!"shouted Attilla, both males transformed to beast mode 
and
> > they tried to bite RazorCraw
> >
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > > Razor Claw stood poised to attack. his raptor legs were bent and
> > his tail curled behind him ready to push him forward toward 
Attilla
> > and Luzbel.
> > >
> > > Bullet had seen the mutant in action and fealt bad for the two
> > dragons. The former Trainer had sided with the mutant as a favor 
to
> > Blaze but soon saw what he was capable of. Common sense told him 
he
> > didn't want to enrage Razor Claw.
